description:
A trusty floor pump will help you get pumped about riding. Whether you are fine tuning your tubeless set-up, dialling in your rock hard road tires, or topping up your running stroller’s tires, the Sterling floor pump is up to the job. With its clever foot-activated switch, this pump lets you go from high-volume to high-pressure, without moving your hands.

  • Switches between high volume and high pressure with the flick of a switch
  • Alloy base for improved stability
  • Aluminum construction is light, strong and corrosion resistant
  • Universal head works on both presta and schrader valves
  • Large, easy to read gauge has both PSI and Bar
  • Needle and plastic valve adapter tucked into the handle, for pumping up balls and pool toys
name: Crankbrothers Sterling Floor Pump
